verses.roman:
kukuro bhajamānaś ca
śuciḥ kambalabarhiṣaḥ
kukurasya suto vahnir
vilomā tanayas tataḥ

synonyms: kukuraḥ—Kukura; bhajamānaḥ—Bhajamāna; ca—also; śuciḥ—Śuci; kambalabarhiṣaḥ—Kambalabarhiṣa; kukurasya—of Kukura; sutaḥ—a son; vahniḥ—Vahni; vilomā—Vilomā; tanayaḥ—son; tataḥ—from him (Vahni).
translation: Kukura, Bhajamāna, Śuci and Kambalabarhiṣa were the four sons of Andhaka. The son of Kukura was Vahni, and his son was Vilomā.
